Initialize()

Initialize an uninitialized mpv instance. If the mpv instance is already running, an error is returned.

public void Initialize()

Remarks

Some options are required to set before Initialize: config, config-dir, input-conf, load-scripts, script, player-operation-mode, input-app-events (OSX), all encoding mode options

Exceptions

ClientException

Thrown if initialization was not successful

SetWakeUpCallback(WakeUpCallback, nint)

A placeholder to disallow setting wake up callback, because we're already running event loop.

public void SetWakeUpCallback(MPVClient.WakeUpCallback callback, nint data)

Parameters

callback MPVClient.WakeUpCallback

Callback function

data nint

Pointer to arbitrary data to pass to callback

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if method is called as operation unsupported
